Node.definition: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind

mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

Node.gloss: to be impossible|to be out of reach
Node.definition: = state of being beyond someone's capacity to handle
= plan or strategy thought out by humans or deities to accomplish a certain goal; ≈ when used for humans, only used in a negative sense

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= particle marking a proposition as not true
literally: knowing; hence: = a collection of information stored and processed in someone's mind that gives that person the ability to analyse, discern, make decisions and act accordingly

Node.gloss: to consider|to pay heed|to perceive|to realize|to understand|to distinguish
Node.definition: = process by which someone gains knowledge and understanding by observing carefully in order to see through the outward appearance of things and grasp their essence
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used for hearing; also a common place to wear jewelry
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans or deities are unwilling to engage in any way with (other) humans or deities, or with other objects and events
= state by which humans or deities are having second thoughts about past actions or plans for the future
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface

= powdery residue left after the burning of a substance; normally deposited outside of a village or city; ► used by mourners to put on their heads or roll themselves into; ≈ associated with things that are fine and powdery and easily scattered by the wind, with low status, and possibly with mortality as well
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= man; ◄ from Teman (תֵּימָנִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= descendant or inhabitant of Teman (תֵּימָן)
= process by which the anger (אַף) of humans and deities is aroused ◄ like a fire that is kindled
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to be established; hence: = state in which information can be trusted

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= a marker indicating that an important statement is following and demanding the attention of the listener
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= young male bovine; ► clean, used as sacrifice; ≈ associated with power and strength, but also with violence and aggression and therefore often used to denote people who behave as such
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number

= male herbivorous mammal with four legs; ◄ |iovis ladicaudata|i*, fat tailed sheep; ► clean animal, used for sacrifice, source of meat, hides, wool, and horns; ≈ associated with strength and leadership
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
literally: to make go up; hence: = causative process by which humans offer a burnt offering and cause its smoke to go up

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= set of particles marking an object or event as a subset of a larger group which has been singled out from among the rest

Node.gloss: to respect|to look upon or treat with favor|to honor
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone's) face; hence: = action by which humans or deities show favor or respect to someone, ◄ as if by allowing someone who is looking down out of shame or humility to look up directly into one's face
= particle marking a proposition as not true

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= foolish actions that show a lack of respect for God and/or one's fellow human beings

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
literally: to be established; hence: = state in which information can be trusted

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= man; ◄ from Teman (תֵּימָנִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= descendant or inhabitant of Teman (תֵּימָן)
= man; ◄ Shuhite (שׁוּחִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= member of ethnic group ◄ possibly founded by Shuah (שׁוּחַ) son of Abraham (אַבְרָהָם) and Keturah (קְטוּרָה)
= man; ◄ Naamathite (נַעֲמָתִי) ► friend of Job (אִיֹּוב) who comes to comfort but concludes by arguing with Job
= inhabitant of Naamah (נַעֲמָה)

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= a linker introducing a propostion that contains the content of what precedes

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to respect|to look upon or treat with favor|to honor
Node.definition: literally: to lift up (someone's) face; hence: = action by which humans or deities show favor or respect to someone, ◄ as if by allowing someone who is looking down out of shame or humility to look up directly into one's face
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to restore the fortunes (of a nation)
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= causative action by which deities restore the well being of an indivual or group
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

Node.gloss: for the sake of|for the benefit of
Node.definition: = relation denoting that someone performs a certain event for the benefit of someone or something else
= someone with whom a person has some level of association, for example, by geography, social or ethnic grouping, personal connection, or temporary circumstance
= action by which humans or deities add to an existing number of entities
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= daughter of one's father, whether from the same mother or not; ≈ sometimes associated with affection; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= person with whom someone is acquainted in an intimate way
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

= construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction
literally: to shake (one's) head); hence: = action by which humans turn their head from one side to the other ► to express sympathy

Node.gloss: to comfort|to console|to reassure|to express sympathy|to bring relief
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= state of hardship or difficulty in a circumstance, sometimes as the consequence of wicked behavior
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= weight of unknown value; ► used as coinage
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= ring; ◄ made out of silver or gold; ► worn for personal adornment, either in the ear or in the nose
= metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= pertaining to being the last part of an event, close to its moment of completion
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= point in time at which an event starts happening
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= state in which a countable entity is six in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times

= large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a pair of animals, ◄ such as donkeys or oxen, ► tied or yoked together for a common task, plowing or transportation of goods

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= large, strong, female donkey (חֲמֹור) ► used for riding
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which a countable entity is three in number
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
literally: to cry out (someone's) name (something); hence: = action by which humans assign a name to a person or place
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the first in a range
= woman; ◄ daughter of Job (אִיֹּוב) ► the first that was born following his restoration
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= woman; ◄ daughter of Job (אִיֹּוב) ► the second that was born following his restoration
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range
= woman; ◄ daughter of Job (אִיֹּוב) ► the third that was born following his restoration
literally: to be found (in a place); hence: = state in which humans or objects are located in a certain place
= woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not
= state in which the outward appearance of humans, animals, or objects is pleasing to the eye
= direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= state in which a countable entity is four in number
= all of the people born and living at about the same time
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= state in which a human being is nearing the end of a long life
literally: satiated with days; hence: = state in which humans have reached a very old age
literally: satiated with days; hence: = state in which humans have reached a very old age
